Name: Battle Imagine - Airona
Description:
Use to activate or upgrade Airona's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Blessing of Life.

Arcane! Blessing of Life
Summon Airona, chants briefly, and revives all Allies within 20 meters.
(Cannot be affected by the same type of effect within 100s)
Description$english:
Use to activate or upgrade Airona's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Blessing of Life.

Arcane! Blessing of Life
Summon Airona, chants briefly, and revives all Allies within 20 meters.
(Cannot be affected by the same type of effect within 100s)
Description2$english: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
